childMarkdownRemark.html: Hi, I have severe issues with roommates and their cleanliness. I am looking for someone to be my new roommate ( once I evict the current one, hes a f** slob ) and help keep up with all the daily chores. I will be working for most of the day, so I will only be able to contribute to cleaning between the hours of 8:00 pm and 8:30 pm. Also I work from home, so there is to be no loud noises between 8:00 am - 8:00 pm, and 9:00 pm - 8:00 am. Email me at ClassyLiving@gmail.com
